Episodes.Title: City of Blood: London, England
Episodes.Plot: The third-season opener explores Victorian-era London, when hard times forced many to take extreme measures to procure food and shelter.

Episodes.Title: Tunnels of Hell
Episodes.Plot: Exploring the Japanese island of Okinawa and its complex system of subterranean tunnels, caves and bunkers that was used during World War II.

Episodes.Title: Real Mafia Underground
Episodes.Plot: Underground Sicily and the origins of the Mafia are explored. Included: the escape route of a mob boss; a bone crypt; and bunkers used during World War II by the Axis powers.

Episodes.Title: Secret Sin City: Las Vegas, USA
Episodes.Plot: Underground Las Vegas is explored. Included: secret surveillance centers for casinos; underground vaults; and tunnels used during the Prohibition era.

Episodes.Title: Hitler's Trenches
Episodes.Plot: Underground Belgium is explored, focusing on the trenches and tunnels of World War I.

Episodes.Title: Barbarian's Lair
Episodes.Plot: Exploring life beneath the streets in Europe after the fall of the Roman Empire.

Episodes.Title: Land of Manson
Episodes.Plot: Underground Los Angeles is explored. Included: Charles Manson's subterranean hideaways; tunnels used by corrupt cops; the subway system; and military bunkers.

Episodes.Title: Gladiators: Blood Sport
Episodes.Plot: Ancient Rome is explored, focusing on places associated with gladiators, including the Colosseum, brothels and crypts. Also: a school where gladiators learned how to fight and survive.

Episodes.Title: Secret Holy Land
Episodes.Plot: Underground Ethiopia is explored. Included: tombs of emperors; subterranean cathedrals; and the palace of the Queen of Sheba. Also: theories regarding the possible resting place of the Ark of the Covenant.

Episodes.Title: Under the Rock
Episodes.Plot: Underground San Francisco is explored. Included: an ammunitions depot; a former repository for nuclear missiles; Civil War fortifications beneath Alcatraz; and tunnels below Chinatown.
